alert.note: Alert for Northern Harrison; Northern Jackson; Southern Harrison; Southern Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 1:58PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Harrison and Jackson Counties through 230 PM CDT... At 158 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lyman, or near Gulfport, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gulfport, Biloxi, Ocean Springs, Long Beach, Moss Point, St. Martin, Escatawpa, Gautier, D`iberville, Wade, Latimer, Lyman, Saucier, Gulf Hills, Vancleave, Gulf Park Estates, Hickory Hills, Helena, Hurley and Gulfport Airport. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 23 and 71. Interstate 110 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Harrison; Northern Jackson; Southern Harrison; Southern Jackson
